page.title: 15CUSTOMS
page.content:
For many years all the villagers of {Farnham Common}took part in the Harvest Supper. Everyone made something to eat and anyone who could sing,dance or recite poetry helped with the entertainment. As the village has expanded it no longer involves everyonein the village. It still occurs annually but it revolves around the Members of the church and old villagers. The newcomers don't seem to want to be involved.
{Stoke Poges}has an annual fair. It is held in the grounds of Stoke Court.
{Fulmer}still retains one of its old customs. The Morris Dancers dance outside the village pub on Easter Monday. Any village school events also involve everyone in the village.
